Risk Issue: Failure of core switching hardware
Impact Statement: Complete loss of external connectivity for all users; 3 days of lost productivity.
Outcome Definition: Restore network services within 4 hours.
Controls/Mitigations: Full hardware redundancy and quarterly failover testing.
Actions Text (Current): Schedule replacement of edge switches Q4 2025.
Notes / History: Initial risk identified during data centre audit.,

Risk Issue: Loss of single point of knowledge for legacy system.
Impact Statement: Project dependency delays; potential data loss if handover fails.
Outcome Definition: Knowledge transfer completed within 4 weeks of notice.
Controls/Mitigations: Cross-training plan established for two junior team members.
Actions Text (Current): Recruit backfill candidate within 60 days.
Notes / History: High impact due to key project nearing delivery.,

Risk Item: GDPR Fine due to Data Leak
Risk Issue: Employee error leading to PII exposure.
Impact Statement: Regulatory fine up to 4% of global revenue. Significant reputational damage.
Outcome Definition: Zero PII incidents reported within 12 months.
Controls/Mitigations: Mandatory annual data handling training and DLP software implementation.
Actions Text (Current): Audit DLP software effectiveness (Q4 2025).
Notes / History: Risk status raised from 'High' due to recent industry breach.,

Risk Issue: Insufficient staffing in Level 1 support team.
Impact Statement: Contractual penalties for missed response times; loss of key client.
Outcome Definition: Achieve 95% SLA compliance across all contracts.
Controls/Mitigations: Hire 4 additional support agents and implement new ticketing system.
Actions Text (Current): Monitor average response time weekly.

Risk Issue: Single supplier dependency for critical hardware.
Impact Statement: 6-month delay on new server procurement, halting key projects.
Outcome Definition: Establish dual-vendor strategy by year-end.
Controls/Mitigations: Identify three alternative suppliers and negotiate framework agreements.
Actions Text (Current): Finalise vendor contract with Vendor B.
Notes / History: Dependency identified during annual budget review.,

Risk Issue: Inefficient resource usage in public cloud environment.
Impact Statement: Budget deficit of $200k in Q3/Q4.
Outcome Definition: Reduce cloud spend by 15% through optimization.
Controls/Mitigations: Implement automated resource scaling and rightsizing of VMs.
Actions Text (Current): Run cost optimization script weekly.
Notes / History: Initial risk based on Q2 forecast data.,

Risk Issue: Policies do not reflect zero-trust principles.
Impact Statement: Audit failure and inability to secure remote workforce.
Outcome Definition: Fully update security policies to Zero-Trust model.
Controls/Mitigations: Draft and circulate new policies for legal review.
Actions Text (Current): Submit final policy draft to board for approval.
Notes / History: Policy review triggered by external security consultant report.,

Risk Issue: Expired maintenance contract on server room fire suppression.
Impact Statement: Total loss of data centre due to fire.
Non-Compliance Impact: Building closure and major equipment replacement.
Outcome Definition: Renew all facility maintenance contracts on time.
Controls/Mitigations: Urgent renewal of maintenance contract; implement contract tracking software.
Actions Text (Current): Confirm contract renewal status weekly.
Notes / History: Urgent risk reported by facilities staff.,

Risk Issue: Known vulnerability in core ERP system.
Impact Statement: Financial reporting errors and data corruption.
Outcome Definition: Patch and test ERP system within 30 days of release.
Controls/Mitigations: Plan and execute system patch deployment; communicate downtime.
Actions Text (Current): Verify successful deployment of patch 1.2.3.

Risk Issue: Reliance on manual, error-prone spreadsheet models.
Impact Statement: Misallocation of capital; failure to secure key funding.
Outcome Definition: Implement a new, validated financial modelling system.
Controls/Mitigations: Procure and integrate automated financial planning software.
Actions Text (Current): Finalise requirements for new FP&A software.
Notes / History: Risk identified in post-mortem of Q3 budget review.,

Risk Issue: Disgruntled employee accessing sensitive IP.
Impact Statement: Loss of competitive advantage; potential legal action.
Outcome Definition: Restrict access to only required sensitive files (Principle of Least Privilege).
Controls/Mitigations: Implement tighter access controls and conduct regular audits.
Actions Text (Current): Audit user access rights to R&D folder.

Risk Issue: Failure to comply with WCAG standards on public website.
Impact Statement: Legal challenge; loss of government contracts.
Non-Compliance Impact: Legal suit under ADA (US) or equivalent.
Outcome Definition: Achieve WCAG 2.1 AA compliance across 90% of web content.
Controls/Mitigations: Conduct third-party accessibility audit and implement remediation plan.
Actions Text (Current): Complete accessibility audit report.

Risk Issue: Unscheduled or poorly tested system changes.
Impact Statement: System downtime, service disruption, and rollback costs.
Outcome Definition: Achieve zero unauthorized high-impact changes.
Controls/Mitigations: Mandatory use of Change Management Board (CMB) and staged rollout.
Actions Text (Current): Train 100% of IT staff on new change process.

Risk Issue: High reliance on non-USD supply contracts.
Impact Statement: Erosion of profit margin by 10% in Q4.
Outcome Definition: Hedge 75% of non-USD exposure through forward contracts.
Controls/Mitigations: Establish hedging limits and execute contracts.
Actions Text (Current): Finalise forward contract agreement with bank.

Risk Issue: Location in a known flood plain.
Impact Statement: Total infrastructure loss; business continuity failure.
Outcome Definition: Migrate critical infrastructure to an offsite, high-ground data centre.
Controls/Mitigations: Finalise contract for secondary cloud region migration.
Actions Text (Current): Complete phase 1 cloud migration.

Risk Issue: Inability to switch key CRM provider.
Impact Statement: Exorbitant renewal fees; limited feature roadmap.
Outcome Definition: Develop a strategy to migrate 20% of users to an alternative platform.
Controls/Mitigations: Review alternative CRM solutions and conduct cost analysis.
Actions Text (Current): Present CRM strategy paper to executive team.

Risk Issue: DR plan not tested or documented since 2020.
Impact Statement: Prolonged recovery time following a disaster event.
Outcome Definition: Conduct bi-annual, full-scale disaster recovery tests.
Controls/Mitigations: Update DR documentation and schedule first test run.
Actions Text (Current): Execute first DR test and document lessons learned.

Risk Issue: Employees are misusing the new billing platform.
Impact Statement: Billing errors, customer complaints, and revenue leakage.
Outcome Definition: Achieve 95% proficiency rating in the new system after training.
Controls/Mitigations: Develop and deploy mandatory training modules for all relevant staff.
Actions Text (Current): Complete mandatory training rollout.

Risk Issue: Phishing successful; data encrypted across the network.
Impact Statement: Full business halt; demanded ransom payment.
Non-Compliance Impact: Loss of service and financial loss.
Outcome Definition: Isolate network and restore services from clean backup within 48 hours.
Controls/Mitigations: Implement 24/7 endpoint detection and response (EDR) and mandatory MFA.
Actions Text (Current): Verify EDR coverage across all endpoints.

Risk Issue: New legislation impacts operating model.
Impact Statement: Loss of market access or increased operational costs by 30%.
Outcome Definition: Diversify revenue streams to reduce dependency on Market X to under 10%.
Controls/Mitigations: Identify and target two new international markets.
Actions Text (Current): Present diversification plan to the board.

Risk Issue: Unsupported operating systems on production equipment.
Impact Statement: Security vulnerability; inability to get vendor support.
Outcome Definition: Achieve 100% compliant OS usage across all production devices.
Controls/Mitigations: Complete hardware and OS upgrade program.
Actions Text (Current): Complete 50% of scheduled OS upgrades.

Risk Issue: Poor guarding on factory equipment.
Impact Statement: Serious employee injury; regulatory investigation.
Outcome Definition: Achieve zero lost-time incidents in a calendar year.
Controls/Mitigations: Conduct full site safety audit and implement necessary physical controls.
Actions Text (Current): Finalise site safety audit report.

Risk Issue: Borrowing costs rise unexpectedly.
Impact Statement: Increased cost of debt by $1M annually.
Outcome Definition: Ensure floating debt exposure is below 40% of total debt.
Controls/Mitigations: Execute interest rate swap or hedge on variable loans.
Actions Text (Current): Finalise hedging strategy with bank.

Risk Issue: Ambiguity in service agreement with major vendor.
Impact Statement: Dispute leading to litigation or service withdrawal.
Outcome Definition: Review and standardize master service agreement (MSA) template.
Controls/Mitigations: Engage external counsel to review MSA template.
Actions Text (Current): Complete review of five key vendor contracts.

Risk Issue: Accidental deletion by user; insufficient backup retention.
Impact Statement: Inability to recover 6 months of historical transaction data.
Outcome Definition: Ensure 1-year backup retention with verifiable restoration testing.
Controls/Mitigations: Implement separate offsite storage for long-term backups.
Actions Text (Current): Verify restoration success on 3 test files.

Risk Issue: Negative campaign or product failure review goes viral.
Impact Statement: Loss of 20% consumer confidence; stock price drop.
Outcome Definition: Implement 24/7 social media monitoring and rapid response team.
Controls/Mitigations: Define crisis communication plan and conduct mock exercise.
Actions Text (Current): Complete crisis response team training.

Risk Issue: Uncontrolled expansion of project requirements.
Impact Statement: Budget overruns by 40%; delayed delivery by 6 months.
Outcome Definition: Enforce formal scope change request process across all projects.
Controls/Mitigations: Train PMs on scope change control and sign-off procedures.
Actions Text (Current): Audit 3 active projects for scope change compliance.

Risk Issue: Unencrypted company laptop stolen from public place.
Impact Statement: Exposure of sensitive data; compliance breach.
Outcome Definition: Enforce 100% disk encryption and mandatory remote wipe capability.
Controls/Mitigations: Verify encryption status on all mobile devices.
Actions Text (Current): Confirm 100% encryption and MDM policy is active.

Risk Issue: Incorrect calculation in quarterly compliance filing.
Impact Statement: Regulatory sanction and forced resubmission.
Outcome Definition: Automate all high-risk regulatory reporting calculations.
Controls/Mitigations: Procure and implement regulatory reporting software.
Actions Text (Current): Complete internal verification of Q4 report.

Risk Issue: Failure to meet projected returns or strategic goals.
Impact Statement: Withdrawal of critical funding for the next financial year.
Outcome Definition: Maintain strong communication and achieve 90% of key strategic milestones.
Controls/Mitigations: Schedule monthly strategic update meetings with all key partners.
Actions Text (Current): Prepare updated strategic roadmap for Q1 2026.
